___migrateNgrxData.description: Migrate from ngrx-data, will rename modules.

___skipPackageJson.description: Do not add @ngrx/data as dependency to package.json (e.g., --skipPackageJson).

___effect.description: When false use the EntityDataModuleWithoutEffects module instead of EntityDataModule.

___module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.
